result.name: Crowne Plaza Hong Kong Causeway Bay

reviews.text: I always always get the best sleep here in this hotel. They have the most comfortable beds and you can order your pillows from their pillow menu as you like! Room service is consistent too, I always have their mushroom soup which never fails to cure my hangover.

I have looked at the reviews of the hotel and it looked like a good place to stay. After the first night of our stay, our family found out that we had flea bites on the lower part of our body, even our ankle. The night we discovered it I immediately told the Assistant manager (Mr.Chan). Mr. Chan asked us if we wanted to change rooms. I said yes. He said two out of four have bites and only one person from each room had bites. Then he implied that it can’t be from the hotel and must be outside. The next night we had flea bite on the lower part of our body again. Changing rooms didn’t even help. The service was terrible. Also they gave us the wrong key card after we changed rooms to a family room. The breakfast was very horrible; everything was plain. Rooms with problems are 1513, 1514, 2508, 2509

High value salad lunch buffet, net net $170 per pax. High ceiling and clear height window! Hot dishes and noodles are also included. Can also pay extra for steak and seafood main course if you want but my husband thinks that the salad buffet is more than sufficient! Will come back again!
Very good location in shopping area.  Lots of famous restaurants surrounded the hotel.  Buffet was worth the price.  Service was above average.
Awesome location. Great rooftop bar. Yummy breakfast. And great views.

result.adr_address: 2/F Crowne Plaza, No. 8, Leighton Rd, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 2/F Crowne Plaza, No. 8, Leighton Rd, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Imperial Treasure Fine Chinese Cuisine

reviews.text:
Food: 7/10
Service: 4/10

Set in a five-star IHG hotel, I expected better. I’ve been here a few times, but gravely disappointed in today’s meal. The food was decent, although some were overly sweet, and had tiny portions. The service was mediocre; the manager we spoke to tried to weasel out of the situation at hand: the chicken feet (鳳爪) was cold, and when it was taken back into the kitchen, it was clear to see that the dish was microwaved. We asked them to steam it again, and the manager looked at us with disdain. The dumplings had crystal clear skin, though a little too sticky for my taste. The Pineapple Buns with Barbecued Pork tasted like alcohol, which lead me to believe that the bun was fermented for too long. The suckling pig was good, and had to be preordered. I recommend the Dried Scallop and Egg White Fried Dice, as well as the Black Gold Sesame Bun. Would consider coming back due to convenience, but not for service.

The BEST Cantonese restaurant in Causeway, with exceptional service, brilliant dishes and splendid taste.
Best kept secret for all foodies.
Always full and better make a booking days before!
Too many highlight dishes,  and always come back for more.
Highly recommended for all kind of foodies,  family or friends gathering.
Great taste doesn't come cheap, well worth it~

A pleasant surprise from a franchise with Michelin stars credential.  If you don't think traditional Cantonese cuisine prepared at the highest level belong in the Pantheon of fine dinning, think again.  And if you are a Cantonese,  this exceptional restaurant should make you proud, and it will make you come back again and again.
Quality dim sum inside Crowne Plaza hotel. Would recommend!

reviews.text:
食物水準高，價錢不算天價！要早去或預訂出名菜式，夜去乜都冇！
女服務員ok, 但男服務員似 MK茶記……凶你囉！高級酒店中菜廳都咁嘅

result.name: Kudos

reviews.text: Good quiet place for business lunch/buffet. There is a good selection of seafood, Asian style cooked food options, dessert and drinks. Price is also pretty good considering it’s buffet style dining.

I budget date night location. They offer excellent main courses at night and the buffet with oysters is extremely worth it. Would recommend but it is not a place where it is easy to eat more than you pay.
Good lunch buffet. Delicious and Yammy taste. But the space is a little bit small in size
Fair price with fair quality
Sunday lunch buffet here. Good dinning environment with high headroom and large French glass.  Fair price @ HKD280 net each (with 15% credit card discount this time).

result.name: Kudos

reviews.text:
我們一行八人到Kudos 晚餐，大約晚上8:00，我詢問一位帶黑框眼鏡的男部長，用匯豐信用卡是否送椰汁花膠雪耳燉鮮奶，他說是，並會在晚上8:30送上。 但大約8:40，仍然沒有提供有關食品，之後我詢問另一位帶眼鏡的女侍應，她說幫忙問部長，但她沒有再跟進，5分鐘後，我選擇不再等候，因為小孩開始疲倦，我就找最初跟進有關食品那位帶黑框眼鏡的男部長結賬，但5分鐘後我們仍收不到賬單，只看見那部長仍然站著。 我只好找另一個中年沒有帶眼鏡的部長結賬，這部長才說晚上9:00才奉上有關食品。 其實貴餐廳完全沒用心為客人準備有關優惠，部長說8:30提供，但最後沒有跟進，只讓我們白白地等，我們晚上6:45開始晚餐，但等到晚上8:50,貴餐廳完全沒有提供有關食品，最後結賬又不理會。
那位帶黑框眼鏡的男部長服務有待改善。
Good quiet place for business lunch/buffet. There is a good selection of seafood, Asian style cooked food options, dessert and drinks. Price is also pretty good considering it’s buffet style dining.

這餐廳在酒店一樓，亦不需多說，環境滿分！
今次是第二次來吃半自助餐，對上一次都已經是一年多前！
今天是情人節，幸好早幾天訂了枱，如不預早訂枱肯定沒有得吃！！
半自助餐是主食要在餐版裡選一款，今天我選了半熟羊扒，情人選了豬扒。先說我的半扒，如怕生您亦可同服務生說要幾多成熟，我本人喜歡生一點，所以叫了五成熟，羊扒鮮嫩有羊味加上薄荷啫喱醬，真的十分美味！
而我情人的豬扒用鐵板上，豬扒的生熟程度有八至九成，要全熟的可在鐵板上兩邊微微煮熟，豬扒亦嫩滑多汁！主食真的十分美味！
再說說自助餐部份，前菜沙律多款、有湯兩款，魚生剌身、壽司十多款！凍蝦、凍蟹、凍螺、麵包蟹及青口不停添加！
前菜我的至愛，即開生蠔，每次攞三隻，我猜我吃了四打左右，亦不停的為您供應！
還有多款熱食和甜品！吃到我和情人很滿足！
有機會值得一試！
Lunch buffet 價錢合理，食物質素則一般，相比下，羊扒最好味。
服務員很有禮貌，但餐廳比較熱。

reviews.text: 😅一般般。😅好坐吾好食。選擇少😭
好👌

○:タイムズスクエアすぐそばの良好なロケーション。昼夜を問わぬ屋上からの眺望。快適な室内空間。
△:コストパフォーマンスが良好とはいえない。外構未改修部のチープさ。

I always always get the best sleep here in this hotel. They have the most comfortable beds and you can order your pillows from their pillow menu as you like! Room service is consistent too, I always have their mushroom soup which never fails to cure my hangover.

地下鉄からは少し歩きます。トラムはセントラル方面からハッピーバレー行きに乗れば目の前で停まります。最上階にインフィニティプールがあり泳ごうかと思いましたが肌寒いのとラウンジの目の前なので恥ずかしいのとでやめて、ひたすら美味しいビールを飲みました。水曜日の夜はハッピーバレーで競馬があり10ドルで入場できるので歩いて行ってみました。ビールテントが並び半分くらいの人は飲みに来てる(印象)みたいで気楽に楽しめます。
